response.original_title: Hello, My Name Is Dick Licker
response.overview: Rich's mom just got engaged. There's only one problem: the guy's last name is 'Licker'. Under the looming prospect of being known as 'Dick Licker' for the rest of High School, Rich teams up with his best friend to secretly disintegrate the relationship before its too late. Witty stuff ensues.
response.title: Hello, My Name Is Dick Licker
